article_title: The Treatment Center: Poverty and economics intersect with drug use
article_text:
Salem, MO (65560)

Today

Thunderstorms. High 83F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low around 65F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

article_metadata.author: Tyler McConnell

og.description: “You don’t turn to drugs unless you can’t find satisfaction in another way, in your own life.”-Richard Nixon, first president to declare a “War on Drugs” in 1971
